description: Number of partitions of n into parts not of the form 21k, 21k+2 or 21k-2. Also number of partitions with 1 part of size 1 and differences between parts at distance 9 are greater than 1.
references: G. E. Andrews, The Theory of Partitions, Addison-Wesley, 1976, p. 109.
